Set.Text: Must have built a Market in all Cities. The cost goes up the more cities there are in the empire. Gain an additional trade route slot and +25% [ICON_GOLD] Gold in the city in which it is built. Trade routes other players make to a city with an East India Company will generate an extra 4 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for the city owner and the trade route owner gains an additional 2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
